title: Editing the config file throws error

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
Editing the config file so that it would use my defined keypoints/joints throws error when I click ok (after saving the config file):

I followed this tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KcXogR-p5Ak

```
In [2]: deeplabcut.launch_dlc()
GLib-GIO-Message: Using the 'memory' GSettings backend.  Your settings will not be saved or shared with other applications.
Created "/scratch3/3d_pose/animalpose/Moth/mothtracked-Mona-2019-10-29/videos"
Created "/scratch3/3d_pose/animalpose/Moth/mothtracked-Mona-2019-10-29/labeled-data"
Created "/scratch3/3d_pose/animalpose/Moth/mothtracked-Mona-2019-10-29/training-datasets"

Creating the symbolic link of the video

/scratch3/3d_pose/animalpose/Moth/mothtracked-Mona-2019-10-29/videos/better_output.avi

. [OPTIONAL] Use the function 'add_new_videos' to add new videos to your project (at any stage).
This tool has been deprecated, use 'gio open' instead.
See 'gio help open' for more info.

See 'gio help open' for more info.

Project "/scratch3/3d_pose/animalpose/Moth/mothtracked-Mona-2019-10-29" already exists!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
/scratch/sjn-p3/anaconda/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/deeplabcut/gui/create_new_project.py in create_new_project(self, event)
    292             self.edit_config_file.Enable(True)
    293             if self.parent.GetPageCount() < 3:
--> 294                 page3 = Extract_frames(self.parent,self.gui_size,self.cfg)
    295                 self.parent.AddPage(page3, "Extract frames")
    296                 page4 = Label_frames(self.parent,self.gui_size,self.cfg)

     48         # self.sel_config = wx.FilePickerCtrl(self, path="",style=wx.FLP_USE_TEXTCTRL,message="Choose the config.yaml file", wildcard="config.yaml")
     49         sizer.Add(self.sel_config, pos=(2, 1),span=(1,3),flag=wx.TOP|wx.EXPAND, border=5)
---> 50         self.sel_config.SetPath(self.config)
     51         self.sel_config.Bind(wx.EVT_FILEPICKER_CHANGED, self.select_config)
     52

    208             else:
--> 209                 self.file_open_bool = webbrowser.open(self.cfg)
    210             if self.file_open_bool:
    211                 self.pose_cfg = auxiliaryfunctions.read_config(self.cfg)

---> 60         if browser.open(url, new, autoraise):

--> 157                                  for arg in self.args]

    159             if sys.platform[:3] == 'win':

    295                 self.parent.AddPage(page3, "Extract frames")
    296                 page4 = Label_frames(self.parent,self.gui_size,self.cfg)

---> 50         self.sel_config.SetPath(self.config)

In [3]: 

```

Please note that after it crashes, if I load the existing project it works (loads the keypoints I define as saved in configs.yaml)
